name: Build Your Own Soup

ingredients.name: Nourish Broth Mix
ingredients.additionalInstruction: or your choice of broth mix

ingredients.name: cooked pasta or steamed chopped potatoes
cooked beef, chicken, shrimp, or tofu

preparation: In a large mason jar, layer broth mix, pasta, protein, veggies, and spinach.
Prior to serving, add boiling water. Secure lid and let rest 5 min.
Remove lid, stir, and enjoy. Caution: mason jar will be hot.
tips: Easily prep your soup jar a day ahead, stash in the fridge, and take it to go on busy workdays!
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: This is a perfectly balanced dish.

products.name: Nourish Broth Mix
summary: Rich taste of slowly simmered chicken with garden-fresh flavours of onion, celery, and herbs. Just add water!
